messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re:  2252 - For Kelley in NJ
messages.msgSnippet: Hello Ned, I m very interested in the newsletter by a lady with the name of parent but I can t find it.  If you have the time could you send the information to
messages.messageBody:
Hello Ned,

I'm very interested in the newsletter by a lady with the name of parent but
I can't find it. If you have the time could you send the information to
find this to me too?

Joyce (the other one on the unschooldotcom list)

-----Original Message-----
From: Luz Shosie and Ned Vare [mailto:nedvare@...]
Sent: Saturday, August 17, 2002 1:42 PM
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: 2252 - For Kelley in NJ


on 8/15/02 10:31 PM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com wrote:

> This meeting and the responses from this site, to
> my concerns have really put me at ease.

To Kelley: There's a wonderful woman in NJ, last name Parent, who writes a
good newsletter mostly about unschooling. You'll find her. ( I just can't
locate it right now) If you don't ask and I'll look for it.

Ned Vare
